channel.title: Portal select an option

item.title: Portal select an option
item.dc:creator: @r0m3r0 r0m3r0
item.description:
@r0m3r0 wrote:

how do i make teleport options work, i did it for one portal(zamorak portal)i added the options and the clickingmost code for it to teleport you when you click on an option, but wen i did it for another portal(saradomin portal) i again added the option and clickingmost code there were no compile errors but wen i clicked an option it teleported me to the place coressponding to the number of option that the zamorak portal does

heres my code in client: [code=c] if (objectID == 4388)//zamorak
{
teleEffect = 1;

			sendQuest("King Black Dragon", 2482);
			sendQuest("Kalphite Queen", 2483);
			sendQuest("Wilderness PvP", 2484);
			sendQuest("Fun Pk", 2485);
			sendFrame164(2480);
}
			if (objectID == 4387)//saradomin
{
			teleEffect = 1;
			
                            sendQuest("Melee", 2482);
			sendQuest("Range", 2483);
			sendQuest("Mage", 2484);
			sendQuest("Train All (High Combat)", 2485);
			sendFrame164(13768);
}[/code]

and heres my code for clickingmost:

case 9178://King Black Dragon c.triggerTele(2272, 4680, 0); break; case 9179://Kalphite Queen c.triggerTele(3484, 9509, 0); break; case 9180://Wilderness PvP c.triggerTele(3098, 3527, 0); break; //case 9181://Fun Pk //c.triggerTele(3427, 3538, 0); //break; case 9182://melee c.triggerTele(2096, 4421, 0); break; //case 9183://range //c.triggerTele(3484, 9509, 0); //break; case 9184://magic c.triggerTele(3263, 3270, 0); break;

the ones that have the // i havnt goten to them as in i havnt found a good area for that
im using delta server and delta client if that info is needed

Read full topic
